head.title: Imperiled Homeless Shelter Serves a Specific Purpose

hedline.hl1: Imperiled Homeless Shelter Serves a Specific Purpose

abstract.p: Carol Ann Rinzler and Perry Luntz letter on September 24 article holds Grand Central drop-in homeless shelter serves specific purpose in neighborhood (S)

block.p: Re ''A Homeless Shelter in Search of a Home of Its Own'' (Sept. 24): In a year when politicians talk of substituting services from ''faith based'' organizations for those of government, it is appalling that St. Agnes Church can find no room at the inn for the Grand Central drop-in center. Despite its shortcomings, the center serves a specific purpose in a specific neighborhood, offering refuge to a homeless population brought to Midtown by the transportation hub at Grand Central Terminal. Unless St. Agnes plans to relocate the terminal with the drop-in center, evicting the center will only create new problems.
CAROL ANN RINZLER PERRY LUNTZ Turtle Bay
